action.action-desc: Ms. Houlahan (for herself and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To ensure that borrowers who have performed qualifying public service are eligible for Public Service Loan Forgiveness.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Payment Completion Fairness Act or the PSLF Payment Completion Fairness Act.
Section 455(m)(1)(B) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e(m)(1)(B)) is amended by striking (i) is employed and all that follows through (ii) has been and inserting has been.
